experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
recruiter_description: Led Cloud Cost Optimization Initiatives, architecting OptiCloud, an internal cloud governance system that optimized AWS and GCP resource allocation. Implemented dynamic cost policy enforcement and real-time anomaly detection, reducing unnecessary cloud spend by $30M annually and increasing policy compliance by 70%.

Optimized API Reliability and Performance by designing a high-performance API orchestrator for cost analysis queries. Implemented gRPC batching, event-driven retries with Kafka, and intelligent circuit breakers, reducing API failure rates by 60% and cutting query latency by 60% (200ms → 80ms).

Built a Real-Time Cloud Cost Analytics Dashboard, integrating TypeScript, Angular, and Go-based APIs to provide engineering teams with granular cost tracking and forecasting. Increased adoption of cost-saving recommendations by 50%, leading to faster and more informed cloud infrastructure decisions.
experience.quote: "Exemplified exceptional professionalism and an unwavering work ethic, consistently taking ownership, seeking excellence, and delivering high-impact results. Brought dedication and accountability to every challenge, ensuring both personal and team success." - Team Lead

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
recruiter_description: Optimized Metadata Sync Performance, achieving an 8x speed improvement (40+ minutes → under 5 minutes) for a mission-critical backup system. Reduced gRPC round trips by 70%, implemented intelligent caching, and migrated from dbClient to dbPool, significantly enhancing data consistency and system reliability.

Led a Cross-Functional Initiative to enable multi-archival location support for Rubrik’s Reports service, improving visibility for 5000+ enterprise customers. Designed an internal blobstore helper, optimized MySQL-backed metadata indexing, and established company-wide best practices for pyramid testing, increasing system scalability and maintainability.

experience.title: Software Engineer
recruiter_description: Developed an IoT Alert Monitoring Platform, integrating MQTT, Telegraf, InfluxDB, AWS, and Grafana to process and visualize real-time telemetry data from 300+ IoT sensors. Automated device registration and testing for LoRaWAN connectivity, improving deployment efficiency.

Optimized Sensor Firmware and Data Transmission, rewriting embedded C code to reduce downlink frequency, extending battery life by 20x. Identified and resolved supply chain bottlenecks caused by excessive transmission rates, ensuring scalability and cost efficiency.
